short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go to the beach, take a walk. From the comfort of your home.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Go to a different location on every new tab. Outside Simulator for Chrome gives you a full browser view of amazing locations. An immersive experience to give your brain a little boost every time you open a new tab.

Features:
- Beautiful locations with every new tab.
- Pomodoro Tracker.

 Add a refresher to your daily browsing and work routine, add Outside Simulator to Chrome!
